special_attacks: breath weapon (100-ft. line, DC 28, 20d6 acid), crush, mass laughter, slow breath
languages: Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Gnome, Halfling

(CL 23rd)

At will-grease (DC 17), hideous laughter (DC 18), stone shape, transmute mud to rock, transmute rock to mud, wall of stone

(CL 15th)

7th (4/day)-reverse gravity, teleport object (DC 23)

sections.body: This whimsical dragon spends most of its time in combat trying to annoy and frustrate its enemies.

name: Dragon, Metallic, Copper, Ancient
skills: Bluff +32, Craft (traps) +42, Diplomacy +32, Fly +18, Knowledge (geography) +32, Knowledge (history) +32, Perception +32, Perform (comedy) +29, Sense Motive +32, Spellcraft +32, Stealth +18, Use Magic Device +32
